Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Holiday Inn Express London - Dartford in Dartford, you'll be convenient to Orchard Theatre and Bluewater Shopping Centre. This hotel is within close proximity of Dartford Borough Museum and Lakeside Shopping Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 126 air-conditioned rooms featuring LED televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Holiday Inn Express London - Dartford. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and laundry facilities. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Holiday Inn Express London - Dartford. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

London (LGW-Gatwick) - 43.5 km / 27 mi

The preferred airport for Holiday Inn Express London - Dartford is London (LGW-Gatwick).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Express By Holiday Inn Dartford is London (LGW-Gatwick) - 43.6 km / 27.1 mi.
